overview:
With over 17 years of experience helping his clients define their destination and develop a flight plan to reach it, Tony’s Legacy Wealth Management firm continues to provide quality financial planning aervices.

When he is piloting his plane, he never takes off without first filing a flight plan. Safety is the primary reason. A flight plan takes into account the distance to your destination, looks at the weather that could interfere with the flight, and allows you to mark the way points that indicate you are still on course.

An old adage states there are old pilots and bold pilots but no old-bold pilots. Charting a financial course toward your goal is a complex task and represents a long-term commitment. Tony’s firm, Legacy Wealth Management, is committed to helping clients prepare for the future.

Securities and Advisory services offered through LPL Financial A Registered Investment Advisor Member FINRA/SIPC
